from matplotlib.pyplot import figure, show
from seaborn import countplot
tar='mfr'
fig = figure(figsize=(12,6))
ax = countplot(data=df,x=tar)

# Visualizing the countplot of manufactures, who produce which type of cereal i.e cold or hot.
* cold cereal - a cereal that is not heated before serving. 
*  hot cereal - a cereal that is served hot. cereal - a breakfast food prepared from grain.    cornmeal mush, mush - cornmeal boiled in water.
